about_the_game:
In FOR THE QUEEN, you are a queen's skeleton knight, suffering from a memory loss.
You have to annihilate the villages of humans and elves according to your queen's will and regain your body and memory in this roguelike auto battler.

This DLC tells the story of the village girl and Aisha.

It features Aisha, who is always there to help you no matter how many times you forget, and a rebellious village girl waiting for the hero.

Check out their story and see the added H-scenes.
In addition, the prison inmates who follow the village girl are also added as a unit.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content, sexual acts or extreme violence, Sexual assault/Non-consensual sex, Bondage play, and Extreme violence. 
All characters in-game are consenting adults.

detailed_description:
In FOR THE QUEEN, you are a queen's skeleton knight, suffering from a memory loss.
You have to annihilate the villages of humans and elves according to your queen's will and regain your body and memory in this roguelike auto battler.

This DLC tells the story of the village girl and Aisha.

It features Aisha, who is always there to help you no matter how many times you forget, and a rebellious village girl waiting for the hero.

Check out their story and see the added H-scenes.
In addition, the prison inmates who follow the village girl are also added as a unit.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+, 8, 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 1.2+ GHz & SSE2 support
  • Graphics: DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Downloadable content for the Queen. New stories are added. - DLC: Aisha's Additional Story and H Event Scene - DLC: The Village girl's additional story and 3 H Event scenes - New Faction Units
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal
